eventsFunctionsExtensions.author: @4ian, Entropy, VegeTato
eventsFunctionsExtensions.name: Flash
eventsFunctionsExtensions.shortDescription: Make an object flash visibility (blink), color tint, object effect, or opacity (fade).
description: Make an object flash for a period of time so that it alternates between two different states.
Includes the ability to flash visibility (blink), color tint, object effect, or opacity (fade).
After adding a behavior to an object, you **trigger the effect** by using the **Flash action**.
- Let players know they are invincible after being hit
- Catch player attention on the interface (for instance a "press start" text)

eventsFunctions.description: Color tint applied to an object.
eventsFunctions.fullName: Color tint applied to an object
eventsFunctions.name: ColorTint

events.comment: Return the color string for the tint applied to the object

eventsFunctions.description: Check if a color tint is applied to an object.
eventsFunctions.fullName: Is a color tint applied to an object
eventsFunctions.name: IsTinted

eventsFunctions.description: Toggle color tint between the starting tint and a given value.
eventsFunctions.name: ToggleColorTint

events.name: Note: This function cannot be "public" until it properly handles objects without a starting color tint variable (NULL)
Swap between the starting tint and the given value

eventsFunctions.description: Toggle object visibility.
eventsFunctions.name: ToggleVisibility

eventsBasedBehaviors.description: Make the object flash (blink) for a period of time so it alternates between visible and invisible.
eventsBasedBehaviors.name: Flash

eventsFunctions.description: Make an object flash (blink) visibility for a period of time.
eventsFunctions.name: Flash

parameters.description: Duration of the flashing, in seconds
parameters.longDescription: Use "0" to keep flashing until stopped.
parameters.name: NewFlashDuration

eventsFunctions.description: Check if an object is flashing visibility.
eventsFunctions.name: IsFlashing

eventsFunctions.description: Stop flashing visibility (blink) of an object.
eventsFunctions.name: Stop

eventsFunctions.description: the half period of the object (time the object is invisible).
eventsFunctions.name: HalfPeriodTime
eventsFunctions.sentence: the half period (time the object is invisible)

propertyDescriptors.label: Half period
propertyDescriptors.description: Time that the object is invisible
propertyDescriptors.name: HalfPeriodTime

propertyDescriptors.label: Flash duration
propertyDescriptors.description: Use "0" to keep flashing until stopped
propertyDescriptors.name: FlashDuration

eventsFunctions.name: Flash

parameters.description: Duration of the flashing, in seconds
parameters.longDescription: Use "0" to keep flashing until stopped.
parameters.name: NewFlashDuration

eventsFunctions.description: Check if an object is flashing a color tint.
eventsFunctions.fullName: Is object flashing a color tint
eventsFunctions.name: IsFlashing

eventsFunctions.description: Stop flashing a color tint on an object.
eventsFunctions.name: Stop

eventsFunctions.description: the half period (time between flashes) of the object.
eventsFunctions.name: HalfPeriodTime

propertyDescriptors.label: Flash duration
propertyDescriptors.description: Use "0" to keep flashing until stopped
propertyDescriptors.name: FlashDuration

eventsBasedBehaviors.description: Flash opacity smoothly (fade) in a repeating loop.
eventsBasedBehaviors.name: FlashOpacity

eventsFunctions.description: Make an object flash opacity smoothly (fade) in a repeating loop.
eventsFunctions.name: Flash
eventsFunctions.sentence: Make _PARAM0_ flash opacity smoothly to _PARAM4_ in a loop for _PARAM3_ seconds

parameters.description: Duration of the flashing, in seconds
parameters.longDescription: Use "0" to keep flashing until stopped.
parameters.name: NewFlashDuration

eventsFunctions.description: Check if an object is flashing opacity.
eventsFunctions.name: IsFlashing

eventsFunctions.description: Stop flashing opacity of an object.
eventsFunctions.name: Stop

eventsFunctions.description: the half period (time between flashes) of the object.
eventsFunctions.name: HalfPeriodTime

propertyDescriptors.label: Flash duration
propertyDescriptors.description: Use "0" to keep flashing until stopped
propertyDescriptors.name: FlashDuration

propertyDescriptors.label: Target opacity (Range: 0 - 255)
propertyDescriptors.description: Opacity will fade between the starting value and a target value
propertyDescriptors.name: TargetOpacity

propertyDescriptors.label: Starting opacity
propertyDescriptors.description: Opacity will fade between the starting value and a target value
propertyDescriptors.name: StartingOpacity

eventsBasedBehaviors.description: Make the object flash an effect for a period of time.
eventsBasedBehaviors.name: FlashEffect

eventsFunctions.description: Make an object flash an effect for a period of time.
eventsFunctions.name: Flash
eventsFunctions.sentence: Make _PARAM0_ flash the effect _PARAM3_ for _PARAM2_ seconds

events.comment: Stop flashing existing effects if the effect name changed

parameters.description: Duration of the flashing, in seconds
parameters.longDescription: Use "0" to keep flashing until stopped.
parameters.name: NewFlashDuration

eventsFunctions.description: Check if an object is flashing an effect.
eventsFunctions.name: IsFlashing

eventsFunctions.description: Stop flashing an effect of an object.

eventsFunctions.description: Toggle an object effect.

propertyDescriptors.label: Flash duration
propertyDescriptors.description: Use "0" to keep flashing until stopped
propertyDescriptors.name: FlashDuration

eventsFunctionsExtensions.name: TiledUnitsBar
eventsFunctionsExtensions.shortDescription: A bar that represents a resource in the game (health, mana, ammo, etc).
description: A bar that represents a resource in the game (health, mana, ammo, etc).
There are ready-to-use resource bars in the asset-store [resource bars pack](https://editor.gdevelop.io/?initial-dialog=asset-store&asset-pack=resource-bars-resource-bars).

eventsBasedBehaviors.description: A bar that represents a resource in the game (health, mana, ammo, etc).
eventsBasedBehaviors.name: ResourceBar

events.comment: This is done after the events to allow users to read the previous value at the end of the change.

eventsFunctions.description: the value of the object.
eventsFunctions.name: Value

eventsFunctions.description: the maximum value of the object.
eventsFunctions.name: MaxValue

eventsFunctions.description: Check if the bar is empty.
eventsFunctions.name: IsEmpty

eventsFunctions.description: Check if the bar is full.
eventsFunctions.name: IsFull

eventsFunctions.description: the previous high value of the resource bar before the current change.
eventsFunctions.name: PreviousHighValue

eventsFunctions.description: Force the previous resource value to update to the current one.
eventsFunctions.name: UpdatePreviousHighValue
eventsFunctions.sentence: Update the previous resource value of _PARAM0_

eventsFunctions.description: the previous high value conservation duration (in seconds) of the object.
eventsFunctions.name: PreviousHighValueDuration
eventsFunctions.sentence: the previous high value conservation duration

eventsFunctions.description: Check if the resource value is changing.
eventsFunctions.name: IsChanging

propertyDescriptors.label: Previous high value conservation duration (in seconds)
propertyDescriptors.name: PreviousHighValueDuration

eventsBasedObjects.description: A bar that represents a resource in the game (health, mana, ammo, etc).
eventsBasedObjects.name: TiledUnitsBar

events.comment: This allows to detect a change of "intial value" on hot reload.
Create the child-object instances.
Pass the configuration to the behavior (MaxValue must be set before Value).

Children instances must be resized when the button size change:
- background is resized to take the full dimensions of the button
- the bar size is refreshed according to the value

The scale is set back to 1 because it means that the parent instance has the same dimensions as the union of its children instances.

eventsFunctions.description: Center the bar according to the button configuration. This is used in doStepPostEvents when the button is resized.
eventsFunctions.name: CenterBar

eventsFunctions.description: the value of the object.
eventsFunctions.name: Value

events.comment: The value is clamped by the behavior. This is why Object.Value() is used instead of Value directly.

eventsFunctions.description: the maximum value of the object.
eventsFunctions.name: MaxValue

eventsFunctions.description: Check if the bar is empty.
eventsFunctions.name: IsEmpty

eventsFunctions.description: Check if the bar is full.
eventsFunctions.name: IsFull

propertyDescriptors.description: It's used to detect a change at hot reload.
propertyDescriptors.name: PreviousInitialValue

propertyDescriptors.label: Unit width
propertyDescriptors.description: How much pixels to show for a value of 1.
propertyDescriptors.name: UnitWidth

propertyDescriptors.description: Only used by the scene editor.
propertyDescriptors.name: BarVerticalAnchorOrigin

propertyDescriptors.description: Only used by the scene editor.
propertyDescriptors.name: BarVerticalAnchorTarget
